appendix:
Geographical availability
&suse; offers 24x7 priority support for the PAYG versions of the following products:
&priority_support_offerings;
You can transact priority support through the &aws; and &azure; marketplaces, where you will see two different listings: A global one and one for EMEA Orders Only. Two listings are needed as there are different regulations to comply with, but the images and the support offering are identical. Select the correct listing for your organization's CSP account:
Other countries
If the billing or tax address of your organization's CSP account is located in a country not listed below, you currently cannot transact priority support through the CSP's marketplaces.
&suse; is committed to making priority support available in more countries. In the meantime, you can still use &suse; PAYG products with regular support from the CSP. If you want support by &suse;, use a BYOS version.
&aws;
To select the correct listing, check the tax address of your organization's &awsa; account. For more information, refer to .

&azure;
To select the correct listing, check the sold to address of your organization's &azure; account. For more information, refer to .
EU and UK
&suse; is currently working on making priority support available in the European Union and the United Kingdom.
